data.title: Avril Lavigne''s Wedding!!!!
data.meta_description: ~~Avril Lavigne married her longtime boyfriend Deryck Whibley in sunny Montecito,California on Saturday afternoon.  She wore an ivory Vera Wang Gown, and...

#1

~~Avril Lavigne married her longtime boyfriend Deryck Whibley in sunny Montecito,California on Saturday afternoon. She wore an ivory Vera Wang Gown, and carried a bouquet of white roses. I have been able to find a couple of pics from her wedding, if anyone is interested. Congrats Avril & Deryck!!!!

For more info on their wedding, check out Avril Lavigne Marries Deryck Whibley

bling*diva*

It looks like a very pretty dress, but it is horrible on that runway model. That style of dress calls for a more voluptuous figure, someone with some actual breasts and a curvy waist line, not a bony scrawny stick. The pics aren''t quite good enough to tell how Avril pulls it off.

~~I HATE how most of the designers always use stick thin models to wear their gowns down the runway. I think they should use a model that BEST suits the dress. The same body type does not look good in all dresses, especially if they have a different silhouette! That drives me absolutely insane!!!!
